an10.123:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, nannatra sugatavinaya.
an10.123:1.3: Sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi, sammananam, sammavimutti—
an10.123:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma parisuddha pariyodata, nannatra sugatavinaya”ti.
